name: Pixel World (itch) (Tom Délié)
description:
Pixel World

Basic platformer game made with Godot Engine.

How to play?

Collect all chests to win.

Run: left/right arrows
Jump: up arrow (walljumps are possible)
Dash: shift
Fireball: spacebar

Credits

Title screen music: Eric Skiff - HHavok-intro
Stages music: Eric Skiff - A Night Of Dizzy Spells
Victory screen: Eric Skiff - We're all under the stars
Game art:  A platformer in the forest by Buch
